author: shemnon
msg: Comliance with the JSP1.1a erratta for issue 7.  Attributes of the types
listed in table 2-4 of section 2.13.2 should have automatic string
conversions done.  All introspection is done at compile time and literal
java values are placed in the code to speed up execution of the page

author: nacho
msg: In windows, Tomcat can serve the text of jsp page only
changing the case of the file name, now it performs
the safe checks in case sensitive way.
